snippet.title: Reliquary - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Reliquary is coming to Nintendo Switch Winter 2022!

Reliquary is a story-driven action-adventure game in which you explore the preserved ruins of a vanished empire as you fight your way through a land teeming with monsters, magic, and lost technology.

#Reliquary #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
